title: Average ticket price Atlanta Hawks ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 8 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately negative which exists from 2008/09 to 2006/07.
But, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2015/16 to 2014/15.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2014/15 to 2013/14.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2013/14 to 2012/13.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2012/13 to 2011/12.
Differently, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2011/12 to 2010/11.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2010/11 to 2009/10.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2009/10 to 2008/09.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Atlanta Hawks games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16 . In the 2006/07 season , the average ticket price was 42.18 U.S. dollars .
